name: FUT 22 Card Creator
description:
Create your own customizable FUT 22 Card designs. 

All the Team of the Year (TOTY), Icons, Heroes, Player of the Month (POTM), Team of the Week (TOTW) and other special cards in the game are available! 

It's very easy, you can change all statistics with one tap. So is choosing a picture.

More than 200+ nationalities and teams!

Save to gallery and share, have fun!

This application is not endorsed by or affiliated with Electronic Arts Inc. All trademarks and copyrights belong to their respective owners.
